Sentencas: Homogeneous co-precipitation and hydrothermal treatment were used to prepare nano- and highly dispersed NiO/YSZ (yttria-stabilized zirconia) composite powders.
Titulo: Single-step Preparation of Nano-homogeneous NiO/YSZ Composite Anode for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Composite powders of size less than 100 nm were successfully prepared.
Titulo: Single-step Preparation of Nano-homogeneous NiO/YSZ Composite Anode for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: This process did not require separate sintering of the YSZ and NiO to be used as the raw materials for solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Single-step Preparation of Nano-homogeneous NiO/YSZ Composite Anode for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The performance of a cell fabricated using the new powders (max. power density similar to 0.87 W/cm(2)) was higher than that of a cell fabricated using conventional powders (max. power density similar to 0.73 W/cm(2)).
Titulo: Single-step Preparation of Nano-homogeneous NiO/YSZ Composite Anode for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Co-precipitation and hydrothermal treatment proved to be very effective processes for reducing cell production costs as well as improving cell performance.
Titulo: Single-step Preparation of Nano-homogeneous NiO/YSZ Composite Anode for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
